sourcesContent:
// SignIn.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { signInWithGoogle, signInWithEmailPassword } from '../helpers/Auth'; const SignIn = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const handleGoogleSignIn = async () => { await signInWithGoogle(); }; const handleEmailPasswordSignIn = async () => { await signInWithEmailPassword(email, password); }; return (
